nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, the Galactic Republic Navy's 2nd Fleet blockaded the Quellor sector, which contained the Purse Worlds of the Trade Federation. As such, the Trade Federation Home Defense Legions of the Confederacy of Independent Systems engaged the Republic fleet, keeping it at bay with their large fleet of Lucrehulk-class Battleships.
The blockade was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
